name: Ban Slinger
description:
Play as a hammer wielding demon slayer. Ban demons to the underworld with swift blows to the face. Prevent more demons from spawning by destroying 15 dark crystals!

Controls:

Arrow keys - movement

SPACE - jump

X - attack

Z - slam attack (when glory fully charged). Can use while in air!

ESC - pseudo pause menu in game

Follow me on twitter at https://twitter.com/cilethdev for updates on Ban Slinger and my other game projects!
